title: The Adoration of the Shepherds
credit_line: Mary Louise and Henry J. Gailliot Fund for Acquisitions
provenance_text:
Sir Peter Lely [1618-1680], London, England. William Cavendish, 2nd Duke of Devonshire [1672-1729], Chatsworth House, Derbyshire, England. By descent to Andrew Cavendish, 11th Duke of Devonshire [1920-2004], Chatsworth House, Devonshire, England; Trustees of the Chatsworth Settlement, England, by 1985; (sold at Christie's, London, England, December 5, 1985) [1]; Private collection, Germany. (C. G. Boerner, Inc., New York, NY, 2001); purchased by Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, June 2014. 
NOTES: [1] Lot 80.
